title: Herbal Medicine
description: "A pack of herbal concoctions typically extracted from the xerigium plant. Less potent than industrial pharmaceuticals." - In-game desc The Herbal Medicine is a only natural medicine that can only come from the plant "Healroot". The only medicine that can SPOIL over time (~2 Years). The only medicine that can be grown and harvested. The plant is grown in "Growing zones" or Hydroponics.
